author: {'steamid': '76561198033263509', 'num_games_owned': 2923, 'num_reviews': 570, 'playtime_forever': 904, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 904, 'last_played': 1507895469}
review:
Сиё  есть  сказ  о  земле  египетской,  о  царствии  фараонов  и  жестоких  богах,  о  тьме  в  сердцах  людских  и  бедах  великих.  Начиная  покровителем  крохотного  племени,  протягиваем  мы  сквозь  века  нить  судьбы  народов  подчинённых  силой  да  миром  присоединённых.  Надлежит  нам  заботиться  о  процветании  земном,  но  не  забывать  о  жизни  загробной  и  восхвалениях  божественных,  ибо  обида  Их  способна  напустить  несчастья  и  казни  страшные  на  земли  нам  подвластные.

А  если  без  лишней  лирики  и  драматизма,  то  игра  интересна  прежде  всего  местом  действия  –  Древний  Египет  не  слишком  часто  попадает  в  перекрестие  прицела  разработчиков,  а  тут  такой  стратегический  сюрприз.  В  «Predynastic  Egypt»  присутствуют  две  карты  –  начальный  регион  и  непосредственно  великая  река  Нил  –  центр  существования  всей  представляемой  в  игре  цивилизации.  Кроме  нас  на  картах  присутствуют  другие  племена  и  народы,  которые  могут  быть  как  врагами  коих  надлежит  покарать,  так  и  друзьями  с  кем  можно  поторговать.  Наша  же  цель  –  грамотно  управлять  ресурсами,  выстраивать  внешнюю  политику  и  решать  подкидываемые  самим  временем  задачки.

Одной  из  главных  стратегических  частей  игры,  как  упоминалось  мною  ранее,  является  добыча  и  распределение  ресурсов  необходимых  под  разные  нужды.  Еда  для  покупки  новых  рабочих  и  организации  набегов,  производство  соответственно  для  строительства  зданий  и  присоединения  дружелюбных  деревень  миром,  вера  пригодится  в  исследовании  технологий,  авторитет  для  активации  коротких,  но  крайне  полезных  бонусов  от  культов  богов,  а  войска  понятное  дело  для  защиты,  захватов  и  грабежей.  Всё  находится  на  своём  месте  и  всё  необходимо  в  той  или  иной  ситуации.  Испытания,  которые  буквально  валятся  нам  на  головы,  можно  решать  несколькими  путями,  используя  для  этого  разные  ресурсы,  что  позволяет  маневрировать.

Познавать  механику  игры  приятно  ещё  и  потому,  что  тут  чувствуется  внимание  к  маленьким  деталям.  Например,  изучаем  мы  новую  технологию  и  нам  не  только  сухо  напишут  плюс  столько-то  к  тому-то,  но  парой  строчек  расскажут  как  и  для  чего  оно  было  в  реальности.  А  анимированные  карты  рабочих  занимающихся  земледелием,  охотой,  молитвами,  торговлей  и  прочим  –  подкупают  своим  стилем,  отчего  смотреть  на  заставленный  подобными  картами-рабочими  регион  одно  удовольствие.

К  сожалению  не  обошлось  без  минусов,  коих  на  мой  взгляд  два.  Первый  заключается  в  том,  что  ближе  к  концу  игровой  кампании  всё  сводится  к  единой  цепочке  действий  необходимых  для  победы,  Это  обидно  резонирует  с  предоставляемой  в  первой  половине  свободой  действий.  Если  игру  можно  было  бы  выиграть  разными  путями,  а  не  одним  –  было  значительно  лучше.  Второй  момент  замечается  не  сразу  а  на  повторные  прохождения.  Игра  становится  в  высшей  мере  предсказуемой,  ибо  все  основные  события  в  каждой  партии  повторяются  год  в  год.  Пропадает  новизна  и  игроки  уже  знают  какие  решения  стоит  принимать  и  какие  ресурсы  копить.  Но  опять  таки  первые  пару  игровых  пробежек  проходятся  очень  приятно  и  бодро.

Плюсы:  стиль,  воплощение,  процесс.

Минусы:  прямолинейность  концовки,  предсказуемость  событий.

author: {'steamid': '76561198085543719', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 1096, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1095, 'last_played': 1527445011}

author: {'steamid': '76561198067327309', 'num_games_owned': 697, 'num_reviews': 163, 'playtime_forever': 4003, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3419, 'last_played': 1510847246}
review:
Predynastic Egypt เกมที่มาในสไต์ Worker and  Placement กับธีมในยุคอียิปต์โบราณ ที่คุณต้องจัดสรร และนำพาชาวอียิปต์ไปสู่ความเจริญรุ่งเรือง ความรู้สึกตอนเล่นจะเหมือนกับว่าเรานั่งเล่นบอร์ดเกม เป็นการวางคนงานไว้ในที่ต่างๆที่เราต้องการทำแอ็คชั่น 

เกมนี้มีปรับระดับความยาก ง่าย และไกด์ก็สอนพอใช้ได้ ไม่ต้องงมเองมากนัก เป้าหมายของเกมคือ เราต้องทำภารกิจทั้งหมดให้เสร็จสิ้นก่อน Turn ที่ 220  โดยจะเริ่มภารกิจสุดท้ายได้ Turn ที่ 204  พอจบ จะมีการรวมคะแนนที่เราได้ คะแนนจะคิดมาจาก เควสหลักในเกมและเป้าหมายทั้งหมดของเกม ซึ่งการจะทำให้ได้ดีและผ่านทุกเป้าหมายถือว่ายากพอสมควร ยากมาก แม้ว่าจะเล่นในระดับง่ายสุด เพราะกว่าที่เราจะตั้งตัวได้จากสิ่งที่ให้มาเริ่มต้นเพียงแค่คนงาน 1 คน ก็ปาไปไม่รู้ Turn ที่เท่าไหร่แล้ว ไม่พอ ยังมีเควสต่างๆคอยขัดขวางเราตลอดทาง อย่างเช่น รวมชนเผ่า สงครามกลางเมือง ถ้าไม่ศึกษาหรือเตรียมตัวให้ดี เป็นไปได้ยากมากที่จะผ่านไปได้ในระดับ Gold

ส่วนระบบการเล่นเกมนี้ก็ไม่ยุ่งยาก เพียงแค่ลากคนงานไปวางในจุดต่างๆที่ต้องการ  สามารถเปลี่ยนจุดได้ตลอดเวลาปรับไปตามความต้องการในแต่ละช่วง  มีแต้มวัฒนธรรมให้อัพ  มีสุ่มอีเว้นท์    มีชนเผ่ากลุ่มทั้งกลุ่มเล็กกลุ่มใหญ่ให้เราเลือกผูกมิตรค้าขายหรือว่าจะล้างผลาญเป็นศัตรูก็ได้ ส่วนในระบบการต่อสู้ แทบไม่มีอะไรเลย สู้กันด้วยจำนวนเพียงอย่างเดียว ไม่มีในเรื่องแท็คติกหรือการจัดทัพใดๆทั้งสิ้น คุณแค่เพียงกดคลิกและรอดูผลที่เกิดขึ้น

ถือได้ว่าเป็นเกมที่ยากพอสมควรอีกเกม สำหรับเกมในแนวนี้  ถ้าอยากชนะแบบแต้มสวยๆ ต้องเล่นซ้ำและหาเทคนิคของตัวเอง คือต้องใช้ความอดทนสูง เกมนี้จะเหมาะสุดๆสำหรับพวกเสพติดความยากของเกม แต่ถ้าคุณไม่ใช่สาวกของเกมแนวๆนี้ ผมแนะนำให้คุณไปลองมองหาเกมอื่นจะเข้าท่ากว่า

***ฝากสตีมไกด์ Predynastic Egypt***

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1181074842

author: {'steamid': '76561198316236072', 'num_games_owned': 281, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 1684, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1061, 'last_played': 1508044394}
review:
第一眼看见这游戏就决定买了，就一个原因：[b]简体中文。[/b]老实讲，国人对国外的近代以前的文化普遍了解不多，此类游戏开发简体中文对了解世界历史是很有帮助的。估计有人和我一样，本来以为能看见金字塔啊木乃伊啊，什么什么的，结果完全没搞懂前王朝的含义呢（笑）死于不审题
这款游戏最大的重点就在于[b]遵从历史[/b]，所以游戏性和自由度一定是有所欠缺。最大限度享受的话，就要仔细看游戏中给出的每一个信息，尽管它有时候和通关没什么必然联系。文化发展的整体线条比较顺畅，自然地理和社会条件也被考虑周到。亲手把一个小部落养成文明古国的雏形，很不容易也很有成就感。
随机事件也是很有意思的地方，[spoiler]全困难模式第一把，刚到第3回合，尼罗河就洪水泛滥把我唯一的一个人搞死了…[/spoiler]
考虑到游戏和知识的平衡，更专业的信息不会出现在这里，这也就导致埃及文化中一些重要的名词不会被放出来着重解释，一些埃及独有的思维被策略游戏逻辑所下压去，仅仅沦落为游戏中的一个无差别的元素甚至要为游戏做出一定程度的扭曲。
总而言之，如果有人因为这款游戏而对埃及文化本身产生兴趣，那它的价值可以说是得到最大程度的展现了。
最后，成就设计有的描述很迷根本不对付，还有的有点搞笑啊。。。叛教者什么鬼啦。。。

author: {'steamid': '76561197993312268', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 375, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 247, 'last_played': 1625531427}
review: Простите, но играя в "простом режиме", я надеюсь пройти игру в базовом сценарии от и до, а не тыркаться 4 часа в самом начале раз 6-7, не в силах пройти первый сюжетный квест (привет, великий рандом). За остальные игрушки, конечно, спасибо, но вот эта должна быть более щадящей для казульщиков.

author: {'steamid': '76561198312415829', 'num_games_owned': 93, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1050, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 532, 'last_played': 1662620373}
review:
看了大家的评价，发现自己真的给法老们拖后腿了OTL
玩了大概三局左右，每次都比上一次好，但是一直没有成功统一过埃及emmmmmm一个不小心就把智力问题暴露出来了。
但是不得不提的是这个游戏十分有魔性，也很有代入感。在这个游戏里我就是神明大人【不是，对不起，我太自大了】我要带领我的子民好好的浪！
[spoiler]然后我的子民被我坑死了。[/spoiler]
我不甘心，又重新开局。
[spoiler]然后我的子民又被我坑死了。[/spoiler]
[spoiler]然后可能有一周的时间不敢面对我的子民们。[/spoiler]
今天重新开局后精打细算， 一步一步重新来。我站在高处，仿佛看见了我的子民给我疯狂的打call，我看着他们，慈祥的冲着他们挥了挥手。
[spoiler]然后我已经不敢再坑他们了。[/spoiler]

当然我这种不负责任的法老都是假的，其实这个游戏可玩性高，操作简单，游戏周期短。如果已经厌倦了pvp和别的玩家厮杀，或者是研究副本努力干掉boss的生活，不妨来玩一把这样的游戏让自己好好放松一下。

author: {'steamid': '76561198352854319', 'num_games_owned': 187, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 400, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 397, 'last_played': 1517587138}

author: {'steamid': '76561198032788030', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 165, 'playtime_forever': 1898, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 535, 'last_played': 1652624921}
review:
Хорошая, игра, как альтернативе "Нилу" и подобному. Эх, жаль с тематикой Египта игр не так много. 
Приятная атмосфера, музыка и графика. На проходении, я очень туплю, поэтому быстро бросил. Это мой минус. Не, могу сказать, что для меня она на 5+, потому, что мне больше нравится градостроительные и подобные вещи. 
Но эта игра по своему хороша. 
Тем кого радует тематика Египта, обязательно брать. А я надеюсь, что создатели порадуют нас, подобныи играми и впредь. 
4+

author: {'steamid': '76561198351536192', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 375, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 375, 'last_played': 1506206394}
review:
汉化很有诚意，游戏本身也算得上制作精良。

在制作人员表里看到了很多历史博士的名字，游戏对真实历史是很有考究的。

不知不觉玩了个通宵，新手难度还没打赢……

最大感触是古埃及真的是个宗教国家，45k信仰点那个任务好难。

中国这种后起之秀，三千多年前世俗势力就已经战胜宗教势力，并且留下无神论传统，可以算是异类了。心里感到很骄傲。

author: {'steamid': '76561198006659798', 'num_games_owned': 2882, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 214, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 214, 'last_played': 1506124108}
review: Prosta a zarazem bardzo przyjemna strategia turowa z historią starożytnego Egiptu. Odkrywanie, budowanie, inwestowanie, odkrywanie technologii, handel albo walka. Wszystko to w przyjemnej dla oka oprawie graficznej.

author: {'steamid': '76561198140896461', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 243, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 243, 'last_played': 1505645631}
review: 说一说不推荐的原因：1、垃圾音效又大声又没有美感。2、机制非常的弱智，随着时间推移，在前期没有兵力值时，征服部落全靠人口多少。中期有军力数值之后要看军力多少打仗了。随着回合数增加敌方军力值也在增加，各种消耗也在增加。问题是玩家控制的部落必须对抗十来个部落，而且经常有入侵的。造成军力消耗很大，打不过其他部落，要慢慢耗时间补充。总结：这游戏就是浪费玩家时间的弱智游戏。

author: {'steamid': '76561198211387588', 'num_games_owned': 393, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 241, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 241, 'last_played': 1505751746}
review:
Really a mixed experience... rather enjoyable while it lasts, unfortunatelly that's not for long - a whole playthrough took me about the same time as it would took a single mission in some serious strategy game. But then again, this isn't really a strategy game, thing happen over and over again and there really is no reason to replay the whole thing again. Therefore, any price over a couple of euros is too much for it as you're gonna bag it after finising it once. Yes, there are achievements and you'll probably grind the game for those, but if it were for the game itself, you'd never open it again after finishing it once. 
That doesn't mean it's a bad game - the whole thing is really nicely packed and the game structure, graphics and everything is really nicely done. A lot of effort has been pumped into this thing, there's no doubt about it, and therefore I'll recommend it.. but there is still a lot of work to do if this is to become a real game and not some online or andriod time-killer...

author: {'steamid': '76561198280773629', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 643, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 491, 'last_played': 1505454135}
review:
赞美制作组！赞美汉化人员！
作为埃及爱好者/P社及野蛮系列玩家一本满足！
本来准备观望等打折，结果这游戏我刚加愿望单废狗就出了个拉二！买来还愿！（快住口！）←结果第二天就周一特惠哈哈哈

 游戏在220回合内一切发展都是尊重史实的，也就是说，对于玩家来说，前220回合的内容在于“完美还原历史”/“基本还原历史”或者“无法还原历史”，整个游戏流程是无法离开历史框架的 ；而本作本身的用意之一就是展现历史，因此在限制玩家自由度方面无可厚非。由于要还原历史框架，因此随机事件多半都和自然环境变化及信仰冲突、内战、王权旁落有关，特别超自然和脑洞清奇的展开是没有的。（法老的日常：修墓、收税、把锅丢给努比亚人然后胖揍他们）
 
而由于同样的原因，开局的位置、地块的划分和资源的分布也是固定不变的，加上上述的历史框架限制玩家自由度和随机事件模式的单一，本作在达成一定成就之后的可重玩程度比起同样玩法的野蛮系列是打了折扣的。

地图范围围绕尼罗河流域，并不大。其实如果全部可以分区域放大像定居点那样分配劳动力和资源可能游戏可玩度可以更高一些，希望第二作地图系统有新的变化。资金和资源的话对于历史还原可以尽量再详尽一些。

文化发展路线因为还原历史的限制，无神论路线也是不能成立的，想要无视埃及众神的，吃一记梅杰德死亡凝视！亡国吧唯物主义法老！

220回合之后，游戏里的历史进程就结束了，但大部分事件和建筑其实在220回合内都已经达成，因此220回合后除非你还没有统一埃及，否则除了堆资源之外没有别的可玩了。

很多小细节还是很有爱的，比如存档界面其实是铭刻法老王名字的样式hhh

（暗搓搓问一句有人和我一样清奇是因为初代游戏王掉古埃及坑的吗2333已经对发型失去审美的我只觉得亚图姆真托马的帅233333）

author: {'steamid': '76561198255960253', 'num_games_owned': 229, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 1770, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 662, 'last_played': 1689691145}
review: Très bon jeu, je découvre ce genre de titre "historique par tour" avec celui-ci et j'en suis ravie, de plus les graphiques sont adaptés ainsi que l'ambiance. Je le recommande activement, on en oublie l'heure qui passe.

author: {'steamid': '76561198072155841', 'num_games_owned': 1359, 'num_reviews': 586, 'playtime_forever': 461, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 461, 'last_played': 1503565590}
review:
Predynastic Egypt is a very interesting board-game style computer game, with the mechanism of resource management and worker placement as its core. You play the leader of an Egyptian tribe and guide your people to unify the whole Nile region. The game course is well designed to constantly give you the good feeling of development and achievement while pushing you forward with timed story events. And the higher difficulties are very challanging to most players.

The graphics are drawn in clean and warm ancient Egyptian style, the music fits its theme, and the control is simple yet well functional. There's also some history to learn from the game.

Although Predynastic Egypt is basically of the same genre as the previous product Marble Age from the studio, it shows a lot of improvements in various aspect. 

Highly recommened for strategy game funs, board game funs, and those interested in ancient Egypt history.

另外，感谢达瓦里氏们对中国玩家的重视。

author: {'steamid': '76561198006630095', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 439, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 439, 'last_played': 1499999969}

author: {'steamid': '76561198022408379', 'num_games_owned': 304, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1097, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1097, 'last_played': 1503085944}
review:
[h1]Nice educational, unpretentious strategic without the depth or replaiability of other similar games like Civilization.[/h1]

The historical aspect of the game is marvelously made, and it's its best selling point: if you like history and especially Egyptian history, you will enjoy the game and the various informations contained in it.

Regarding the game itself, it's a different story: Predynastic Egypt is a turn-based strategy game more similar to a board game like Risk/Risiko than a proper video game like Civilization: you merely move your workers on the map, deciding  which type of resources they have to work, and that's it. 
Sure, it lacks the depth of other strategic games, but it's still a very nice, unpretentious game.

It's not for everyone, though: Predynastic Egypt can be very difficult (the tutorial is extremely short and doesn't fully prepare for what lies ahead) and unforgiving; on the higher difficulties, that means that you'll have to follow some precise strategies to ensure victory, severely limiting your game freedoom.
And this is perhaps the game's biggest flaw: freedom and repleability. The game (logically) takes place always on the same map, with the same starting position, the same trials, the same victory conditions and the same terrain yeld [b]for every single campaign[/b] (also every game will always see the same number of tribes, albeit randomized in position, goods and attitude, and the randomized events will always happen on the same turns), meaning that you'll need to adopt always the same strategies to win. leaving very, [very] limited space for creativity and improvisation.

Despite this burdensome flaw, I still reccomend this game for history enthusiasts or for everyone who wants to spend some hours with a relaxing and educational game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064237075', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 881, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 881, 'last_played': 1502895385}
review:
I want to like the game but, in all honesty, it just doesn't feel like a game.

When I bought the game I had already seen a few reviews saying stuff like "you can't deviate from the set strategy if you want to win". I figured people were exaggerating and that the game was simply 'difficult' to clear. (Which is actually a good thing.) 
But with nearly 15 hours on record, a third on my own and two thirds attempting to follow the best guide out there, a ridiculous amount of save-scamming and far too much frustration,  I now can say you truly cannot deviate from the set strategy if you want to beat this game. 

And guess what...
That's not a game. That's click-bait.

I don't buy a game so that I can print out and follow a paper which tells me when to click which button. I buy a game so that I may challenge myself and reach the end goal through various different strategies. Let me try economy. Let me try military. Let me try culture. Give me options. Give me value. Give me a [b]game[/b].

review: Surprising little turn-based strategy game with the rise of Ancient Egypt with must research done and painstaking accurate art. author: {'steamid': '76561197971580755', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 961, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 658, 'last_played': 1501639899}
review: Definitely worth playing if you love a single player board game / puzzle. The game isn't too hard to beat, but getting a high score is a real challenge that is fun to repeat. Some minor randomization keeps things fresh but never interferes with the fun too much. I disagree with the reviews which say it is too hard to defeat the rival clan, or that it changes to a different game halfway through, it is just an additional layer of complexity for once you have the hang of things. Just because you lose a challenge does not end the game, it is actually fairly difficult to fail so hard the game ends. It mostly impacts your points.

author: {'steamid': '76561198098878697', 'num_games_owned': 1773, 'num_reviews': 594, 'playtime_forever': 325, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 325, 'last_played': 1502108187}
review:
[spoiler] 去年加的愿望单，现在暑假稍微闲下来了才买来玩。	[/spoiler]
游戏能做到这种地步就非常赞了，首先感谢毛熊让我体验了一把史前埃及文明的魅力。
玩法确实新颖有趣，虽然没有什么随机元素都是按照史诗线性发展的，但玩了两把仍感觉意犹未尽，在Roguelite元素称霸的独立游戏界，这真是一股清流。
简单地玩了两把，用的都是最简单的难度。
第一把瞎玩，试练都是铜牌之类，结果居然拿到了一个统一银牌，而且用武力征服了整个地图的部落。
第二次就奔着成就去，依旧最简单难度，熟练后自然而然试练全是金牌，结果最后219回合统一，勉强拿个铜牌，而且差1轮就输了？而且也只征服了河周围的部落，大草原和沙漠的根本无力…
我想区别应该是在于第一次玩只依靠开赛特神各种武力镇压，然后第二次玩一上来就把友好度都搞满了最后发现根本没生产力去统一…
统一一个部落要3200生产力？就是因为没生产力了搞的我万事俱备但首都到倒数第二个回合才建完？？
总而言之就是武力镇压比文明统一来得快来得简单……？
但是文明统一可以送劳动者，前期很好用，后期应该就是直接攻击划算了。

虽然不知道历史上真实的史前埃及是如何的，但一路杀过去一点也不优雅好吗 [spoiler] 毕竟战斗民族写的游戏[/spoiler]

[spoiler] 然后作死开了全最高难度，请问这个难度是给人玩的吗？？?	[/spoiler]

期待毛熊们的下一部作品，看名字好像是讲埃及统一后的？[spoiler] 怎么还是埃及	[/spoiler]
再猜测一下，下下部作品或许会是古印度？

author: {'steamid': '76561198040529063', 'num_games_owned': 232, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 124, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 124, 'last_played': 1501983286}
review:
O jogo possui belas artes, é interessante e muito bom para aprender um pouco da história do egito antes das pirâmides (e antes da capital virar Memphis). Infelizmente não tem muita rejogabilidade. Mas pelo preço, acho que valha muito a pena para aficcionados em história.
A jogabilidade é interessante, baseada em civiliatization, porém de uma forma diferente.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056501771', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 10252, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4041, 'last_played': 1569232411}
review: Petit jeu de stratégie basé sur l'histoire d'Egypte au tour par tour.Dans ce jeu Il ne faut pas s'attendre à des effets spéciaux ou des cinématiques attractive et encore moins à des batailles tactique du style total war.Tout est axé sur du statégique avec une évolution historique cartographiée plus ou moins linéaire.Jeu basique rudimentaire avec moteur classique ou vous développez une civilisation ancestrale depuis ses besoins primaire en passant par un arbre de technologie et un coté déification servant de booster pour arriver à l' aphotéose de cette culture avec ses objectifs.Son point fort si vous mettez le coté répétitif du déja vu aprés plusieur parties, reste un jeu agréable à jouer,relativement facile de prise en main gardant son coté attractif ludique plaisant pour jouer et à rejouer.Par le fait je le conseil vivement pour les débutants ainsi que les acharnés du genre.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031302987', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 347, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 347, 'last_played': 1501343723}
review:
The game is fun and teaches you a bit of history in the process (though some of it not entirely accurate), but be aware that you're paying for about 2.5 hours worth of game, at least on the easiest setting.

There is very little randomness, and even that's mostly in the tribe names. For example a tribe may be called the Bull tribe in one game, but the Flax Flower tribe in another, but it will be in the same place, trade the same things, and have the same military strength. So essentially if you replay it, you'll see the exact same game again with different icons on the map. After you've finished it once, well, the only reason to replay is to see if you can do it on a higher difficulty.

I mean, lliterally. You may or may not be able to see that I've played it for 5.8 hours, but that was playing it twice, plus a couple of false starts. I had to play it again to see if anything was different. It wasn't.

Still, for this kind of money, I guess it's not too bad. Short and sweet beats long and dilluted.

author: {'steamid': '76561198322487836', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 605, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 296, 'last_played': 1594474644}
review:
在这一刻，我突然感到中俄友谊在我们这一代非但没有被时间埋没，反而被发扬光大，变得比天高、比海深……咳咳，废话不多说，老老实实写个评测：
在游玩体验上本作如果官方有意完全可以搞成多人桌游，短小精悍，平衡性上也没有太大的硬伤，最多再完善一下探索的过程就可以商业化了，总之可以说是引人入胜，我从11点多打开一不小心就玩到了凌晨4点直到通关；
在画面上略显单薄，但是能很好的反映古埃及主题，总的来说美工的大大们也是很努力的表达出来了自己的想法；
在任务系统上虽然有点随机性，但是节奏很舒服，触发时间总是恰到好处，目标一直很明确，不需要太多的文字去强行解释也能很容易的把握主线使得游戏体验十分流畅；
总之即便是没有官中，我也会趁着夏季特惠买一份回来练英语，但是官方无比贴心的翻译和友好的态度让我对这个作品的看法再拔高了一个档次：好的游戏永远不仅仅源于它的游戏内容，更多的是对玩家的期望的关注（这里日常黑一下se）。总之冲着官方这无可挑剔的服务态度和精致细腻的游戏体验认真的写个长评。（ps：如果官方看见这个评论真的考虑要出个桌游我也是谏言有功呢）

author: {'steamid': '76561198061032182', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 3824, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3777, 'last_played': 1617962151}

author: {'steamid': '76561198020785598', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 82, 'playtime_forever': 131, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 131, 'last_played': 1501040223}
review:
神圣的尼罗河孕育了美丽的古埃及文明
那里荷鲁斯神守护着他们
那里阿匹斯神牛赠与食物和工艺
那里赛特神兽能让他们战无不胜
那里奈克贝特女神让他们充满智慧
.....

《史前埃及》这款游戏是一个从尼罗河的小部落逐渐发展成为埃及王国的游戏，一局游戏是250回合。时间长度基本上是2小时一局，目的就是在回合结束前统一整个埃及，建立古埃及王国，游戏以比较简单的方式，让工人放置在地图上运作（采集，生产，外交等）发展各项数值，最终达到游戏所需的胜利分。
总体来说机制上非常类似于桌游工人放置机制，合理分配工人和资源，保持突发事件应对能力是非常重要的。这游戏还是很有难度的，与时间赛跑的感觉，非常具有挑战性。

游戏上如果熟悉文明系列想必会对此游戏上手会很熟练。游戏遵循历史，从部落开始，当统一周边周围小部落后，初始的城邦形成，开始了王国统一之路，很有一种从小部落发展成为巨大王国的成就感。游戏中的事件也是与埃及历史对应，如果面对这些历史问题（刷分）也是玩家需要思考和挑战的地方。

总体来说，作为一个小款游戏，提供玩法和思路还是有的，趣味和挑战也是有不同难度，套路还真像桌游。但是玩久了摸清套路可能会有点套路吧

推荐人群：文明类游戏爱好者，历史游戏爱好者，桌游德式玩家爱好者

author: {'steamid': '76561198289337437', 'num_games_owned': 251, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 288, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 143, 'last_played': 1673180541}
review: 很不一样的一款策略经营游戏~游戏过程虽然短，但是还是很好玩的。让我们中国人也能了解埃及的历史~

author: {'steamid': '76561198317165198', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 628, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 549, 'last_played': 1558780034}
review:
首先向制作组致敬！

这是一个简化版的文明。玩家扮演埃及的统治者从小部落到统治全埃及。经历天灾和战争，在文化和权力中博弈，体会埃及文明的崛起。

两三个小时就能打通，流程略短，但内容非常丰富，游戏质量非常高，作为一款策略游戏主要考验玩家对资源的分配调整。

游戏中处处可以看到制作组对游戏的用（e）心（yi）和推敲。

推荐。

author: {'steamid': '76561198050002349', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 293, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 293, 'last_played': 1500401047}
review:
Plutôt déçu. Voyant une note extremêment positive, je me dis que le jeu doit être bien.
Les graphismes sont sympas, les mécanismes aussi. La musique un peu répétitive, mais au prix payé, je ne vais pas être trop exigeant.
Pourtant, quand on lance une deuxième partie, on comprend vite que ce sont les mêmes événeements, au même moment. Ce jeu se veut certes historique, mais cela rend le jeu rigide. Dommage, car la base était plutôt intéressante.

author: {'steamid': '76561198231034200', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2993, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 835, 'last_played': 1687925219}

author: {'steamid': '76561198055163097', 'num_games_owned': 636, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 216, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 216, 'last_played': 1500182971}
review:
Ein schönes, ruhiges Spiel, das man, da es auf Runden basiert, sehr gut nebenher spielen kann. Plant eure nächsten Züge genau, denn schnell sind die Vorräte aufgebraucht oder man kann nicht bauen, da Baumaterial fehlt. 
Doch auch der Fortschritt der Kultur ist schnell unterschätzt, denn das Spiel bewertet, wie schnell ihr bestimmte Errungenschaften eurer Zivilisation erreicht.
Resourcenmanagemant und das umverteilen von Arbeitern ist essentiell für den Fortschritt im Spiel.
Hat man seine Resourcen unter kontrolle, kommen immer wieder neue Aspekte im Spiel hinzu und manchmal ist es schon kritisch wenn die Erforschugn eines neuen Gebietes plötzlich 7-12 Runden dauert oder der Bau einer neuen Errungenschaft bis zu 6 Runden, da hilft nur die Götter um Hilfe anzurufen.
Dieses Spiel kann ich nur voll und ganz empfehlen und es ist besonders interessant, für jene die sich gerne mit Ägypen beschäftigen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027640011', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 790, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 507, 'last_played': 1595521305}
review: Pretty cool game, the artstyle is beautiful, and the feel of the game is really nice. It is surprisingly replayable, because each game you try to get a better score, although it lasts around two hours from start to finish (making easy to finish in one session), so after a while you might get tired of it. If you like civ's building aspect and are all about optimization you'll probably enjoy the game. The historical events side is pretty nice and I think the pace and sense of progression you get is well done.

review: 非常有趣的回合制游戏，每一回合都需要合理精密的部署，剧情内容较有限，但通过不同的经营方式，每周目都能有不一样的体验。

author: {'steamid': '76561198025529029', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 794, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 794, 'last_played': 1500249830}
review:
A relatively simplistic game, it's fun the first time around but doesn't have a lot of re-playability -- unless you want to break out the spreadsheets in order to try to maximize your score.  

There is little to no flexibility or actual choices involved in this game -- in order to win the game, you must complete the same basic steps, re civilization/knowledge development or in city building, every time you play.  There is also only one 'winning' outcome, which makes the game less enjoyable on replay.

However, the first play-through is enjoyable!

author: {'steamid': '76561198113690133', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 439, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 439, 'last_played': 1483472896}

author: {'steamid': '76561198313352179', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 343, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 342, 'last_played': 1558610978}
review:
清新脱俗，开始的期待值低一点，反而获得的更多的快乐

review:
If you're here for the killer of the Civilizations franchise, I'm sorry. You came to the wrong place.

If you're here for a game with appropriate and beautiful art, accurate and deep tech, with plenty of factual information....
You won't regret your purchase. I certainly have not.

author: {'steamid': '76561198284769532', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 589, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 589, 'last_played': 1499751106}
review:
[h1]一款近乎完美的历史游戏[/h1]
首先要大力赞扬毛子对国区的态度，不仅有严谨的中文，还有欢乐的介绍=）
游戏可以说是简化的文明[spoiler] 下一回合就睡觉[/spoiler]，但是游戏是线性且忠实的还原了历史人物和地理环境。
最简单模式下游戏时间大约2~3小时，不过想要全成就还是相当的困难，深深地感受到上帝也不好当。

author: {'steamid': '76561198097295751', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 179, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 178, 'last_played': 1536935862}

author: {'steamid': '76561198002567771', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 109, 'playtime_forever': 1579, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 731, 'last_played': 1651586306}
review:
Predynastic Egypt is a resource management and optimization game in which you overcome trials and ordeals and establish Egypt as unified kingdom.
From humble beginnings with simple decisions to make to managing a large amount of workers while planning several turns ahead, Predynastic Egypt offers a pleasant if a bit simple of an experience. There aren't a lot of different mechanics involved, but they do not need to be. With a simple foundation and easily controlled, intuitive basic gameplay you'll be able to manage your tribe and deal with what Egypt has to offer. Multiple difficulty options allow you to customize the game to your liking while everything is explained in enough detail that you will not have to worry about not knowing what is going on, though it still doesn't give you more information than you really need.

One concern is replayability. As it is the same map every time, with the same ordeals every time at the same turns it becomes predictable and later playthroughs will feel repetitive. At the highest difficulties, it's all about solving everything perfectly, with perfect timing on everything and good luck on the random events. If you enjoy achievement hunting, you will get plenty of replayability out of it, but otherwise there isn't much reason to play it a second time.

As for the trials and ordeals, they are challenging when you first go through them, but fair. With a bit of planning and forward thinking you can win the game on your first try. Playthroughs after the first will make it a lot easier and unless you actively avoid doing them it is difficult to really fail at any of them.

A relaxed atmosphere and simple base mechanic means this is mostly a casual game, pleasant to play and worth the time to get it, Predynastic Egypt does what it tells you it does, does it very well, and overall delivers a good experience at a good price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198133307621', 'num_games_owned': 90, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 541, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 541, 'last_played': 1500109569}

author: {'steamid': '76561198122026262', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 130, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 130, 'last_played': 1499979482}
review: 很不错的游戏啊，就是可玩时间有点短，我大概花了2个小时通关，只得到13分。如果想要挑战自己拿到满分33的话还是很有难度。对了，提醒大家一句，国王没叫你造陵墓的时候千万别造，我提前把陵墓造了，结果一直都显示的任务未完成。也不知道是我这bug了。。。反正那个国王给的建造陵墓任务一只没有提示完成。

author: {'steamid': '76561198005391568', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 280, 'playtime_forever': 6459, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 646, 'last_played': 1696087301}
review:
Ce petit jeu est vraiment sympa et extrêmement addictif, contrairement à ce qui a été dit dans d'autres commentaires sa rejouabilité est assez efficace car c'est la troisième fois que je le recommence (en facile) et je n'ai toujours pas gagné (je m'y remets donc demain).

[b]Le jeu[/b] consiste à faire prospérer votre village égyptien durant la période pré dynastique pour peu à peu créer une grande métropole, unir l'Egypte, découvrir un panthéon unique et vaincre vos ennemis.

Vous passerez tout votre temps à créer puis positionner des travailleurs sur certaines cases que vous aménagerez, et dont les carractéristiques évolueront au fil du temps, l'astuce étant de ne jamais manquer des diverses ressources du jeu sous peine d'ètre ralenti et de ne pouvoir réunir les conditions de victoire du jeu.

Votre ressource principale sera la nourriture, indispensable pour créer des travailleurs qui cultiveront vos terres. Puis ce sera la production, sous forme de marteaux, et ensuite la culture, votre armée et l'autorité, pour les technologies et la religion/ordre public.
Vous positionnerez donc vos travailleurs sur des cases champs, des mines, construirez maisons et temples et y positionnerez également vos travailleurs, tout cela vous rapportant des ressources chaque tour de jeu.
Vous consommerez une partie de ces rerssources pour faire tourner votre colonie qui deviendra ville puis mégapole, le but étant d'être dans le positif (chiffre jaune et non rouge) dans chacune des catégories que je viens de citer (nourriture, production...).

Pour exemple, pour créer le panthéon unique (une des conditions de victoire), il faut avant la fin du jeu avoir progressé tout au bout de l'arborescence des découvertes culturelles, scientifiques et militaires, puis au dernier palier dépenser 40K de culture pour débloquer le panthéon unique, or jusqu'à ce jour je n'ai jamais réussi, il me manque la moitié lorsque le gong annonçant la fin du jeu retentit.
Il va donc falloir que je me creuse les méninges et place plus judicieusement mes travailleurs pour ne manquer de rien pendant le jeu et atteindre ce chiffre en culture.

Le jeu se joue en tour par tour, mais il n'y a que vous qui jouez, la fin d'un tour ne faisant qu'avancer le temps et vos actions (construire un bâtiment, amasser assez de blé pour créer un nouveau travailleur...).
Par contre au fil du temps vous subirez divers événements aléatoirs, positifs ou négatifs comme des changements climatiques (pluie ou sècheresse), des attaques ennemies, des rebellions si vous n'y prétez pas attention, et vous devrez parfois vous aussi attaquer certaines tribus qui vous sont hostiles.

Une partie dure environs 2 à 3 heures, ce qui se fait souvent d'un trait tant le jeu est prenant.

Je le conseille donc vivement à tous les amateurs de stratégie/gestion, et pour son modique prix (et sa configuration minimale qui permettra de le faire tourner sur le PC de papy), pourquoi se priver?

author: {'steamid': '76561198068386727', 'num_games_owned': 2700, 'num_reviews': 190, 'playtime_forever': 150, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 150, 'last_played': 1499671970}
review:
超有趣的游戏！
平心而论，简直是ICE近年来遇见的流程最平滑的策略游戏了！
游戏方式类似文明和无尽传说之类的策略游戏，总之就是发展发展然后赢得最后的胜利。
值得一提的是这游戏是没有“同等”的对手的，带入到文明5的话，大概就是全地图只有你一个文明但是周围很多蛮族，然后你要慢慢发展统一大陆，建造奇观等等等等。
第一次玩的话，想达成游戏的胜利还是比较困难的，因为最后的胜利条件很多（你要把奇观建造/科技发展（文化）/军事统一全做到才算数）所以我最后没胜利233
对比无尽传说系列奇葩的任务系统，这游戏的任务系统就很务实了，好评！
作为一个小而精致的纯单机策略游戏，这游戏放弃了使用对等的文明进行发展/对抗的模式，而专注于个人体验
这样大胆的创新，反而让游戏变得更好玩了。这也是这游戏最大的特色吧，希望工作室更加努力233

review: Fun at first, but the game is over after 3 hours, even though everything was going so well. Building, exploring and expanding is fun. Felt like a more user friendly crusader kings. Researching new stuff and build your empire is really cool, and i though i was in for a long exiting game. But 3 hours in, the game is nearing the end and everything is you build is comprimised to race to the finish for the best possible score. And thats it. At its core its a fun game. But it's just to short. 6/10

review: Petit jeu très sympatique visuellement qui nécessite d'être un bon gestionnaire et stratège tout en apprenant au joueur des éléments sur l'Egypte (histoire très mal connue de mon côté). De plus, l'intérêt est qu'on peut faire des parties rapides (autour de 6h) au contraire d'autres jeux comme CIV

author: {'steamid': '76561198006119705', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 539, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 539, 'last_played': 1499424657}
review: C'est un jeu sympa que je ne recommande pas à 10 euros, mais plutôt lorsqu'il est en action. Il fait un peu penser à un jeu de société type Âge de pierre ou Tzolkin. Il s'agit, comme son nom l'indique, de fonder l'Égype ancienne avant la découverte de l'écriture, ce qui est vraiment sympa. Je trouve toutefois qu'il manque des mods qui complèteraient l'expérience de jeu qui est somme toute plutôt courte. La méchanique de jeu est simple, mais efficace. Il faut faire grandir son territoire, réussir une série d'événements aléatoires, bien utiliser ses travailleurs pour qu'ils apportent un bon rendement, piller les territoires alentours.

author: {'steamid': '76561198101246934', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1015, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 993, 'last_played': 1649696328}
review:
游戏扮演统治者带领人民在残酷的大自然和别有用心的异族之间生存下来并不断扩大自己的势力，在原始社会低下的生产力之下，统治者不得不假借神明之口统治着愚昧无知的群众，也要依靠强大的军队开疆扩土来缓解日益增长的村内矛盾，当然这一切的基础都在于国泰民安。
       游戏挺有趣的。不过游戏历程几乎都是按照历史进程来展开的，如果能开个自由随机模式那是极好的。
       不过令人遗憾的是，在游戏即将结束之际我的电脑突然死机，再次开机之时发现存档全部GG……
       淦耶，岂止是原来的存档GG了，新开的游戏连存档都不行了……

author: {'steamid': '76561198046981840', 'num_games_owned': 38, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 253, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 253, 'last_played': 1499022366}
review: Amazing game. Saw it in a Quill18 let's play and had to buy it. Finished one game and will try one more for a perfect score. The price is fair since the replayability of this game is fairly low. If you like strategy and history, this is something for you. expect to be entertained for 4 to 12 hours with this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993755170', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 959, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 618, 'last_played': 1503817852}
review:
Really interesting civ-like. As everything you build goes in its historical place, and it follows the historical record of events, you feel a bit led. I enjoyed the planning and searching fore that extra bit of efficiency at every point.

I think it will lack replyability, but I enjoyed playing through it a few times until I got a win. Well worth the price.

If they released a new game about a different period/place (Mayan kingdoms pls) - I would probably buy it immediately.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000008195', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 735, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 735, 'last_played': 1482983381}
review:
Ein kurzes, aber sehr unterhaltsames kleines Rundenstratgie-Spiel.

Ich fühlte mich in jeder Sekunde gut unterhalten und mehr verlage ich gar nicht von einem SPIEL.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009861178', 'num_games_owned': 322, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 566, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 117, 'last_played': 1499024937}
review:
[h1]Intro[/h1]
Predynastic Egypt vom russischen Indie Entwickler Clarus Victoria ist ein kleines aber feines Strategie-/Aufbauspiel. Der Spieler erlebt die die Geschichte Ägyptens lange vor der Zeit der Pyramiden, aus der Zeit als sie noch ein Nomadenvolk waren und sesshaft wurden.

[h1]Inhalt[/h1]
Das Spiel spielt sich ein wenig wie ein Brett- bzw. Kartenspiel. Man verbringt die Zeit damit abzuwägen wie man seine Bürger in die vorgesehene Slots einsetzt, ähnlich wie die Bürger im Stadtmenu aus Civilization, nur dass es hier komplexer ist. Auf die Art kann man erkunden, Nahrung beschaffen, Produktion betreiben, forschen, kämpfen, handeln, etc.
Man forscht neue Technologien, kann neue Einrichtungen bauen, die Einwohnerzahl erhöhen (die dann natürlich auch mehr Nahrung benötigen). Das ganze verläuft in Runden ab. Der Spieler erfährt viel über die Geschichte.

[h1]Urteil[/h1]
Warum ich dieses Spiel mag:
[list]
    [*]der gemalte Grafikstil im ägyptischen Setting (kein Mobile-Comic-Look)
    [*]sehr einfacher Einstieg, man kommt sofort zurecht
    [*]das Spiel ist an sich simpel, der Schwierigkeitsgrad ist aber angemessen und fordernd und spannend
    [*]interessante Hintergründe über die Geschichte
    [*]schöne ägyptischer Thememusik
    [*]die typische Aufbau-Optimierungsspirale greift hier gut: wachsen, erobern, forschen, optimieren
    [*]Schöne UI die stark an Civ5 erinnert.
[/list]

Was ich noch gerne gehabt hätte:
Es hat leider keinen hohen Wiederspielwert. Man würde es gerne sofort wieder spielen, es hält sich aber halt an die Geschichte, die halt leider nicht viel Abwechslung bietet (trotz verschiedener Schwierigkeitsgrade und einiger Zufallsereignisse).
Mit Zufallsmaps (Geschichte hin oder her) hätte das Spiel VIEL Potential, aber auch so ist es ein kleines schönes Indie-Spiel dass für seine wenige Stunden begeistern kann. Ich würde es wieder kaufen. Ich hatte danach total Bock Pharaoh zu zocken, gerade weil es eigentlich direkt danach anknüpft... ^^

author: {'steamid': '76561197987312565', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 321, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 321, 'last_played': 1498868747}
review:
Very good for one or two playthroughs, mostly for the setting/'story' value; it provides great insight into how prehistoric and early-historic cultures worked, and is generally very educational about a less-explored time in history.

For repeat playthroughs however, the game is far too scripted, the map is not randomized in any way, and the balance generally seems way off in the later, with events and tech providing far too many bonuses compared to just regular tiles, which makes the whole process of moving pops around somewhat pointless.

Definitely recommended for the price, but think of it more like a one-off experience.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009798025', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1284, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 796, 'last_played': 1499876722}
review:
This is a great little game! It's like a cross between Sid Meiers Civilisations, and the old city-builder games of Sierra, specifically Pharaoh from 1999. If you enjoy either of these you will likely enjoy this one!
[b] TL:DR at the end. [/b]

The game is not large or long, as depending on your playspeed and how many playthroughs you do, it will take you between 10-25 hours to complete. And yes this game has some replayabiliy as you are not likely to 'beat' the game on your first try! [spoiler] (The game will still let you keep on playing even if don't fullfill all the objectives by the 220th turn though) [/spoiler]

You play through the foundation of ancient Egypt. As you follow the path to unification the story explains where, how & why, through text, the history of the period. There are no actual building of the Pyramids, as those where built much later during the dynastic-periods.

[h1] Gameplay [/h1]
The challenge of the game is to figure how to beat it, and this may take multiple playthroughs to do. If this is enjoyable or not is completely up to you, but as a Civilisation & City-builder veteran I really liked it. Also unlike those games, 'where you at one point in the middle of the game feel like you have already won and you just keep pressing that end turn button untill you see the victory screen', this game is actually challenging all the way through untill the end! It's designed with a specific playstyle in mind, not leaving much freedom to do things in multiple different ways. Whereas Civ V has 5 different ways of winning the game, Predynastic Egypt only have 1, and there is only one route to it.

You start off with a single 'worker' or 'citizen' to gather food and scout the fog-of-war with, untill you can gather enough food for your second. You assign these to workers to different tiles for different yields Civ-style. (+food, +production or +culture for ex). The game asks you to grow to three population to complete the first chapter. Later you unlock the ability to build buildings, spend culture for Discoveries and authority for Worship. Discoveries is the research off new stuff, and Worship gives you powerful but temporary buffs (like +1 food per farm for 3 turns). 

The goal of the game is to grow your city, encounter local tribes and rival tribal-cities on the map of Egypt, and eventually unifying them into a single kingdom! These tribes you can also raid or trade with; before conquering or integrateing, to add to your proto-kingdom. 

Different stages of the game has you complete different obectives to advance to the next stage, often accompanied with timed missions which you can succeed with a Bronze, Silver or Gold rating. These missions can be to build a temple-building for your god, or to defend against an invasion. The ever increasing challenge of these contributes to a much more difficult and interresting end-game. You are told in advance what type or resources you will need for the mission ahead in general, but no details.

Random events also happens that can help you a lot or harm you a lot. These will be frustrating for some players, those who despises randomness. [i](Think about what some people thought about Darkest Dungeon in their steamreviews. Not nearly as much randomness here though).[/i] The occurrence of these can be turned down in the difficult menu, but not removed completely.

[h1] Graphics & Sound [/h1]
The Artsyle of the worker-cards, eventpictures, enviroments, backgrounds (On both Local-map and Egypt-map), are all great! The Iconc art of ancient Egypt is imitated well with lots of details. 

Soundesign is also good as background music sets the tone and the ambient sound changes as you scroll over the map hovering over water, fields and cities. 

Voice action is completely absent, but would be nice to have since there is a lot of description text...

The U.I design is as almost a copy of Civ V, with some elements like for ex. the dual-map from Pharaoh. This is a good thing!

[h1] Bugs [/h1]
I only encountered one bug. I was using a worship to give my farms +1 food for 3 turns, but an event popped up changing the worship to a % base insted. This caused all my farms to bugout, giving 0 food and becoming unworkable. This caused me to have -150 food and my population to die in starvation! Nothing I could to change it.

I managed to reload an earlier auto-save, and by doing things differently & in an inferior way I could avoid the bug. I reported to the bug to Clarus Victoria and will update this review if they fix the bug.

[h1] Finish [/h1] [b] TL:DR [/b]
Lets try and keep this short. Do I like it? Yes. Do I recommend it to you? Depends on if you like Min-Maxing and replaying untill you 'figure out' the best way of doing things. Also you must have a stomach to handle RNG-events that can fuck you up if timed badly. 

Do you feel the need to have multiple separate, and very different, paths towards reaching the same goal? Personally I don't think this game needs that. You are here to solve a challenge by Min-Maxing and replaying, even if the path is somewhat linear. It's not necessary for every game to have the ability to be played in more then one way, and that is perfectly fine by me.

The management of Civilisations (albeit without the multiple ways of 'winning the game') and the atmosphere & nostalgia of Pharaoh 1999 + the others in that series is what made this fun for me!

You also got to look at the value-for-money. For this low price you get enjoyment for about 10-25 hours, tyring to find the solution for the pussle at hand. Is this good value for you? This cost me 6.99 on a discount, but I would still recommend it at full-price!

author: {'steamid': '76561198142416774', 'num_games_owned': 332, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1679, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 715, 'last_played': 1562284702}
review:
同社のMarble Ageにユニットとマップが追加された4X系なゲーム。
せっかく面倒な部分を削っていたのに、面倒な部分をわざわざ付け足すのか…と思ったが、ワーカーユニットでマップ探索と生産を行うことでMarble Ageより深みを出す試みっぽい。

これもシナリオが固定のため、ランダムイベントをやり過ごして、どれだけゴールへ向けて最適化できるかが繰り返しプレイのポイントになる。
また、日本語化もなさそうではあるが、パラメータの増減が赤字と緑字で表現されているので、それを見て判断すれば英語がわからなくても何とかなる。

それなりに楽しいんだけど、やっぱりシナリオ固定なのだけが残念である。

author: {'steamid': '76561197990453869', 'num_games_owned': 924, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 771, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 642, 'last_played': 1499111205}
review:
1* This game is a blast, pure and simple. If you like strategy, this is for you.
2* As the (immensely lucky) partner of an Egyptologist, I commend its historical accuracy: this game is the standing proof that you don't have to go Assassin's Creed to make history interesting. Kudos!

author: {'steamid': '76561198084635692', 'num_games_owned': 1762, 'num_reviews': 310, 'playtime_forever': 187, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 187, 'last_played': 1498849047}
review:
[code][h1]Полноценный обзор со скриншотами вы можете прочитать здесь: [url=https://doggamingsite.wordpress.com/2017/07/02/predynastic-egypt/] Dreams of Genesis Gaming: Predynastic Egypt [/url][/h1][/code]

Predynastic Egypt - пошаговая стратегия, которая уж очень похожа на серию игр "Цивилизация". Разработчики этой игры родом из России из компании под названием Clarus Victoria. Ранее игра называлась Пре-цивилизация, но разработчики схватили пеню от 2К, которые занимаются разработкой серии "Sid Meier's", по этому игра сейчас называется Прединастия Египта.
 
[h1][i]ЗАДУМКА И РЕАЛИЗАЦИЯ[/i][/h1]
По задумке игра очень похожа на серию игр "Цивилизация", за исключением того, что действие происходит сугубо с одной цивилизацией - Египтом. В плане углубление в Египетскую историю, игра действительно очень неплоха. Есть развитие культуры, строительства, земледелие, мы можем даже торговать с соседними поселениями, ну или взять да завоевать их (это если ваше войско превосходит соперников). Ребята, скажу честно, это уж очень близкий клон великой и ужасной Цивилки. Практически все действия проходят на одном экране, который не такой уж и большой (логично, ведь игра происходит на Египетских землях). Главная задача всей игры покорить себе весь египет, а вот как вы это сделаете уже ваша головная боль. Вы можете стать великим полководцем (наиболее простое решение) или пойти по дипломатическому пути и просто присоединить все поселения для создания непобедимой нации. В игре присутствует развитие, что-то похожее на науку, поклонение Богам, которые дают прирост к той или иной отрасли, ну и конечно же армия. Сами военные действия выглядят как в старых добрых менеджерах футбола. Полоска, которая показывает состояние выживших и главные действия, происходящие на поле брани. Игра проста в плане реализации (по крайней мере внешне так кажется), но в ней очень удачно сохранилось все то, за что люди любят стратегические игры. Здесь вам и постройка зданий, развитие, наем "персонала", распределение ролей для поселенцев, война и дипломатия (хоть и слегка примитивная).
 
[h1][i]ГЕЙМПЛЕЙ[/i][/h1]
Первые несколько минут игры у меня возник такой вопрос: "Где, етитьская фотосессия, эта кнопка основать город?". И потом до меня дошло, что все земли вокруг меня, это и есть мое поселение... и я такой: "АААА-аааа, ну тогда зашибись блин". Геймплей у игры с одной стороны кажется однообразным, но на самом деле мы выполняем очень много действий, которые несколько похожи между собой. Первые действия - назначить людей на добывание ресурсов. В игре не так много ресурсов, как во всеми любимой серии от 2К. Нам доступно: земледельство, добыча камня (наверное), после постройки святилищ можно добывать очки "славы", и нечто похожее на культуру, ну и конечно же очки армии. Все эти пункты в игре обозначены как полезные ресурсы, которые можно якобы добывать. Помимо распределение ролей по этим всем культурам, необходимо один или несколько разведчиков, которые постепенно открывают для вас карту, вокруг вашего города. Ну и не забываем про строителей. Как только вы нажмете построить одно из зданий, не забудьте поставить в окно строительства рабочего. Поверьте, забыть про этот аспект очень легко, а потом спустя несколько ходов думаешь: "А чего еще мое здание не готово?" и обнаруживаешь, что забыл перетащить строителя... и такой: "Етить вашу Клеопатру за левую титьку...". Как я и говорил ранее, окошечко войны довольно простое, но не забывайте перед нападением посмотреть равны ли ваши силы, ибо враг с преимуществом, практически всегда победит вас. Так что собирайте могучее войско достойное Богов и покорите себе весь Египет (прям блокбастерская фраза получилась).
 
[h1][i]ГРАФИКА И ЗВУКИ[/i][/h1]
Графическая составляющая выполнена в довольно смелом и даже интересном виде. Представьте себе наскальные рисунки прямиком из древнего Египта. Представили? Так вот внешний вид игры выполнен именно в таком стиле. Абсолютно все "картинки" выполнены в профиль, как и в старых наскальных рисунках. Все довольно минималистично, но это и есть главная фишка игры. Слышал, что разработчики начали подготавливать новый проект в Predynastic. Думаю на этот раз им стоит потрудиться, ибо Египетский стиль уже не прокатит. В целом все изменения после постройки того или иного улучшения незначительны, но после уже довольно большого количества построек, игра преображается внешне. Что касается звуковой составляющей, мне не удается подобрать нужных слов. Посудите сами, в цивилизации есть хорошая звуковая сопровождающая? Отнюдь. В 90% случаев все игроки просто убирают звуковуху и врубают свою любимую музыку. Такая же ситуация с Прединастией. Плохо ли это? Совсем нет. Просто в стратегических играх не может быть хорошего саундтрека. Почему? Да черт его знает, это как клишейный боевик, который не может повторить ошибок предшественников. В целом игра очень неплохая, но тот факт, что все происходит лишь в одной стране, делает ее немного скучной. Ведь вам хватит пройти ее пару раз, после чего она вам приестся.
 
[h1][i]ПЛЮСЫ И МИНУСЫ[/i][/h1]
Плюсы:
+ Идея хоть и не новая, но все равно цепляет
+ Атмосфера древнего египта передана в полной мере
+ Геймплей похож на популярную серию "Цивилизация"
+ Реиграбельность
+ Возможность окончить игру разными способами (война, дипломатия, вера и прочее)
+ Графическая составляющая подобрана очень удачно
 
Минусы:
- Военные действия показаны в стиле футбольного менеджера образца 2000 годов
- Неоднозначные задания (не совсем пойму к месту ли они #ИМХО)
- Все действия касаются лишь египетской расы (никакого влияния от внешнего мира, такое ощущение, что существует лишь один Египет)
 
Predynastic Egypt - довольно интересная и даже хорошая стратегия в стиле старой доброй Цивилизации. Если вы очень хотите поиграть в хорошую стратегию, но для вас серия Сид Майерс скатилась в бездну бездарности? Опробуйте Predynastic. Оценка 8 из 10.

[code][h1][b][url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/11769719/]Больше обзоров в нашей кураторской группе: Dreams of Genesis [/url][/b][/h1][/code]

review: This game has great first half and boring second half. As the focus of the game shifts from managing a settlement of a handful of workers to managing several cities, the game becomes less and less fun. The tech tree turns into a set of bland modifier bonuses, and the available choices boil down to mashing "Reform: make life in Egypt easier, +5% to everything" button in order to meet an arbitrary and ridiculously high resource target as a final challenge.

author: {'steamid': '76561198090628637', 'num_games_owned': 304, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 430, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 430, 'last_played': 1587567600}
review: Свежий взгляд на исторические стратегии. Хоть я и не был фанатом Древнего Египта, эта игра однозначно захватила и заставила вникать в лор. Одназначно советую к приобретению, хотя игра скорее всего из-за своей линейности увлечёт вас не больше чем на 1-2 прохождения.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052472583', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 527, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 243, 'last_played': 1538207262}
review: A fun small turnbased strategy game. It needs a competative element, or replayability, by adding/modding the possibility of playing multiple or different tribes and their gods, to explore other elements of Kemet. author: {'steamid': '76561198021763496', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 824, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 702, 'last_played': 1500822977}
review:
This is a fun game. But three things break it: 
1. The extremely tight turn limit to achieve victory even on the easiest difficulty
2. The lack of gameplay flexibility to explore alternative strategies because of 1, leading to scripted gameplay where you must follow a fixed path to victory or lose
3. Random negative events that happen anytime, aggravating 1. and 2.

I don't think this game was properly tested on all difficulties. It recommends new players try the easiest difficulty, yet lacks the flexibility for the slightest margin of error even at that difficulty. Even those who manage to complete it on the hardest difficulty can only explain a single way to beat the game. They are unable to explain how to exploit different strategies to achieve victory even though the game gives the impression of such "flexibility" through a diverse tech tree and wide selection of building improvements. This is because the very short turn limit to achieve victory, coupled with arbitrary (by this I mean untested on all difficulties) victory requirements, negates such a notion. 

Many available techs and building improvements could not be researched/built in my attempt to meet the victory requirements because of the short turn limit. For example, the tech point requirement for every subsequent tech scales up as part of the progression mechanic and the second last tech just before the victory tech costs 5000 tech points. This is fine in itself except that the victory tech itself costs 45000 tech points, which is a sudden ninefold jump in tech requirements and appears extremely arbitrary just to make the game "challenging" without proper testing on all difficulties as mentioned. Note that I proritized spending tech points only on techs that allow me to reach this victory tech in as short a path as possible to avoid wasting points on unnecessary techs. I also put a high priority to allocating workers on tiles that give huge tech point bonuses each turn and frequently played options that gave tech bonuses. Yet the game ended when I only had around half the required tech points needed for victory.

In other words, you have to play by the script or lose due to the lack of margin for error even on the easiest difficulty as explained earlier. Do not get me wrong. I like challenging games. But if the challenges do not scale according to the difficulty and are not tested for this, and scripted gameplay is forced on the player to win, there's really nothing to look forward to in the game in terms of replayability. This game is just worth a few hours of entertainment and no more than that.

author: {'steamid': '76561198085773242', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 1206, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1071, 'last_played': 1499160875}
review:
[h1] 一款精良有趣的游戏！	[/h1]
  感谢制作组！游戏很喜欢，制作组态度也满分！现在也是特别期待续作！！

  这部的时间段是bc5000-3000，间隔两千年，那么我应该可以理解为下一作的时间跨度也是差不多这么多吧？所以个人最喜欢的传奇法老拉美西斯二世也估计就快登场了！下一部买买买就对了、、听说还有3d效果了，期待一定的特效吧~比如战争硝烟之类的2333不过的确特效也就是单纯的锦上添花~

  安利一下这个游戏，历史爱好者值得一试！回合制资源安排类，这种下一回合果然都有毒，精简有趣还可以学习姿势~
bgm画风都很符合时代氛围，游戏性也还不错，难度可以有很多档的各类调节，加上中间的事件任务完成评价都会影响最后的得分

  然后前王朝闪电战奇袭赛特部落是真的解气，你们还是图样啊！我们法老的下一回合你根本猜不到（虽然不能随手印卡或者太阳船对地大坟头撞击啥的，但是咱可是自带SL能力！）

重要的事*3： 我们发自内心尊重和热爱中国玩家群体，我们决定发行多语种版本时，最优先考虑的就是发行官方简体中文版。 
我们不敢用机翻忽悠广大玩家老爷，几十万字文本都是由来自社区的资深玩家逐字逐句翻译，只为提供给您最舒服的母语体验！	[/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561198047134587', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 226, 'playtime_forever': 356, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 356, 'last_played': 1497088775}
review:
Just don't waste your time. It is not a strategy, just a puzzle. And one that requires you to simply know all scripted events and trails and prepare for them. There are few things that are random, including combat. In other games that increases re-playability but here it might make following optimal path no longer possible. If you don't get "gold" from trial you don't get associated bonuses and it will be hard to complete next goals.

Other miscellaneous stuff:
- horizontal scroll in technology & save windows is annoying
- fields don't have fixed production, some buildings not only increase but replace production and it is hard to tell exactly what (and where) will happen. Even worse, some of those changes are triggered by scouting/turn progress (at least it looks that way)
- it is hard to estimate "+x%" bonuses impact, it seems like result is rounded up instead of nearest integer.

TL;DR: it is a mix of typical worker placement boardgame (like Agricola) with original Homeworld campaign style( do mission perfectly or you will hit impassable wall in future).

author: {'steamid': '76561198035467587', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 195, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 66, 'last_played': 1518000652}
review:
A fun little game, that will scratch the itch for people who enjoyed games like Pharaoh. It's not nearly as detailed or in-depth as the old City Builders, but it's not pretending to be (or even trying). What it does, it does well.

Pros: Pleasing art style and visuals; gentle learning process; good attention to historical detail (where possible); fun sense of progression and growth from tiny group of hunters to political powerhouse.

Cons: cluttered UI, that isn't always easy to follow; objectives/missions sometimes not explained very clearly. Minor issues, really. 

8/10

review:
Hi Leute,

von mir gibt es eine positive Bewertung.

Predynastic Egyptl ist ein schönes Kleinod für Spieler die auf Historische Spiele.
Es hat eine schöne Mischung aus einfacher Bedinung, historischen Hintergrund und doch Herausforderung. Es ist nicht zu komplex, also gut für Gelegenheitsspieler und trotzdem schöne Sound- sowie Graphik-Atmosphäre. 

Es ist fast so als würde man ein Buch über die Frühzeit von Ägypten spielen und erleben.

mfg gw4444

author: {'steamid': '76561198057608583', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 822, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 692, 'last_played': 1603568985}
review:
首先游戏是很棒的没的说。音乐很有古埃及特色。美术非常有古埃及壁画感，代入感非常强。考证得非常到位的历史，让人玩一遍就能真的懂很多东西。
不过可能因为游戏本身体量小的原因，游戏内容在玩过一遍之后就很难提起精神去玩第二遍，缺乏重复游戏的吸引力。
以及音乐只有一首太洗脑了，求dlc里加一些音乐。
————————————————————————————————
最后非常感谢毛熊朋友的厚爱，作为中国玩家深深感激对中国玩家的上心。中文翻译非常专业，没有错字也没有语病，能得以很顺畅的体验古埃及文化历史。在此说一句，感谢你们！

author: {'steamid': '76561198068597491', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 2086, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2046, 'last_played': 1561543903}
review:
不错的一款史实性的游戏，初期以为游戏是策略类的，后来才发现原来是益智类的[spoiler] [strike] 无误[/strike][/spoiler]，游戏一共只有220回合，但是可以在220回合后继续游戏，不知道是不是开发商并没有在意过220回合以后的事，总之220回合后bug挺多的，尤其是在超过1000回合以后。[spoiler] 比如部落显示已经消失了但是实际还在地图上，努比亚人不受赛特影响，叛乱不解决继续累积下去的话，叛乱地点会重复等= =[/spoiler]游戏部分数值设置也不合理，比如文化值，它的增长是乘法叠加的，在超过1000回合以上可以近似看成指数叠加，这使得其增长值会超过游戏设定的longint上限，大约是2billions左右，超过后文化值的增长会变成-2B，然后扣着扣着就变成0了= =
虽然估计没几个无聊的人玩到1000甚至几千回合以后，但是，我其实就想看看中间那个5500年后考古学家发现遗迹而已_(:3」∠)_

author: {'steamid': '76561198161537310', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1361, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 100, 'last_played': 1651083386}
review: 这个游戏怎么说呢，的确是个好游戏，有着丰富的历史内容，但是可能是因为是偏史实向的吧，游戏到了后期挺枯燥的，元素有些单一，无非是设置好了命令就好几个回合都是休息休息。玩了两周目，就觉得差不多了。建议大家等某天steam临时工了再入吧，原价入感觉不太值。最后再说一遍，游戏内容真的真的太单一了。

author: {'steamid': '76561198060718434', 'num_games_owned': 394, 'num_reviews': 147, 'playtime_forever': 516, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 516, 'last_played': 1494274305}
review:
Fun little game that can be somewhat challenging on the hardest difficulty options. It's not enough to be considered a real strategy game, more like a city management. I'm truly sad at the lack of variety of ways you can tackle the gamethrough, basically focus on construction and culture and you'll win regardless. And the combat system is lackluster and boring at best.

Nevertheless, it is entertaining enough to catch your eye for a few hours, at is intended. I recommend this game but only on a big sale.

7/10.

还行吧，如果多一些地图就好了，两个地图太少了一些，多一些地图比较好。

有些东西也太简化了，连最后迁都孟菲斯都没个动画？在孟菲斯里面搞搞建设什么的也好啊？

但是，中文游戏必须支持！

谢谢开发者这么关注中文区玩家意见，下个游戏我还是会买的。

author: {'steamid': '76561198263264648', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 338, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 138, 'last_played': 1589432632}
review:
+优美的音乐
+丰富的科技树和迷你集中的生产建设
+良心的历史考察和随处充斥的壁画，比如科技树探索作战的呈现都包含壁画
+简体中文
+管的事情比较少，或者说包装的好基本不是很难上手

-再给我五十回合我就能完成主线了（ohh）
-可以稍微再扩充点资源种类和添加相应的event，贸易每次都只能换粮食，换建筑点数觉得有点无聊，换点煤矿啥的更有意思
+-（可选项）后续版本把地图再做大一点，模式再多样一些更吼
+-可以扩充兵种，选择战术之类的
+-外交政治上加点小游戏的小创意，略略略
似乎是不是该考虑按照这样的形式出个罗马帝国，马其顿啥的
总之亲民的公司就是好公司，有诚意的更是‘，
期待新作和后续更新，乌拉，我爱大熊

author: {'steamid': '76561198235905038', 'num_games_owned': 406, 'num_reviews': 106, 'playtime_forever': 1412, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 283, 'last_played': 1649842701}

author: {'steamid': '76561198373745596', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 621, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 621, 'last_played': 1492948109}
review:
我觉得还不错，难度也适中，制作规模而言确实小所以显得不耐玩。我还在研究最难模式下的丰收仪式怎么做。
貌似就一场设定吧？80人的超限额成就不太现实啊？攒粮食一回合造好再填回去么？
我是推荐玩的，精细度很高，我不介意小游戏，并不是说每个游戏都必须巫师或者文明那样极长的游戏时间才行，乐趣更多，制作水平没什么黑点啊，这水准很高拉，值得一玩啊。

author: {'steamid': '76561198061543356', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 161, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 161, 'last_played': 1492562380}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198060868941', 'num_games_owned': 598, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 2797, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2507, 'last_played': 1492785063}
review:
[h1] 这是一款俄罗斯人为致敬中国玩家制作的古埃及游戏[/h1]

[list]

[*]好吧，其实并不是专门为中国玩家做的，只是在制作者宣传时其他国家的反响平平，而在中国论坛的反响比较大[spoiler] 让毛哥深受感动[/spoiler]

[*]玩了快20h，这是个轻量级的文明类游戏，让玩家在从一个小部落探索发展成横跨埃及全图的帝国的过程中顺便学习古埃及的文化历史

[*]上手非常简单，一次游戏有220回合，初始难度和游戏过程中的数次试炼决定玩家的总分。玩这个游戏确实学到了姿势，比如古埃及的两个女神，一个是头牛，一个是只鸦......

[*]只有两张地图，所以可重复游玩度不是很高，不过还是要字词一下，这年头这么重视中国玩家的厂商可不多见啊
[/list]

author: {'steamid': '76561197983563283', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 308, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 308, 'last_played': 1488708539}
review:
[h1]Overall good game with some flaws - recommended if its on discount or if you are into history.[/h1]

[b]Length:[/b]
I will start of with my main critique.
This game has just one campaign and it always plays on the same map.
You always start in the same position and the first events always play out the same. There is a turnlimit before you lose so every game will end at some point if you do not manage to win earlier.
One playthrough will take maybe around 2h.

[b]Strategic Aspect:[/b]
While it might not sound very promising up to this point you can easily play it a couple of times without getting bored. There are several strategic ways to progress further into the campaign and all of them have their strenghths and weaknesses and will guide you in a bit different manner through the game. Do you want to focus more on military and technology or do you want strong economics and be in favor with the gods? Its your choice.
Depending on your playstyle and difficulty setting the game can be hard.
I played it 3 times to the end and failed 2 times (2nd time I would have won just a single turn after the game ended in a defeat). All 3 plays were pretty different after the starting phase.
 
[b]Sound, Graphics & Atmosphere:[/b]
The graphics, while simple, are nicely done and fitting and so are sound and  music.
It has pleasing flair that will grab you and put in the right mood for such a game. 
I would see this as a strongpoint of the game.

[b]Historic Aspect:[/b]
If you have the desire you can learn a bit from this game. I tries to show you the development of ancient Egypt and can teach you a couple of cool things if you are willing to listen.
A nice bonus for me.


[b]Summary:[/b]
This is no Blockbuster or AAA title and it tries not to be one. If you are into history, ancient cultures or simply if its on sale and you want to try a bit of a different strategy/building/management game, this can be the right game for you.
I picked it up in a sale and while I have only played like 6 hours I would see my money well invested.
I am pretty sure that I will play it at some point later on if I am in the right mood again.
That for less money than eating out a in a fast food restaurant? Yeah sure - I will take it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198359947725', 'num_games_owned': 274, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 186, 'last_played': 1487876360}
review:
总是一个出生点，无论是电脑还是玩家，大大的降低的游戏的自由度和耐玩性，从玩家的游戏时长就可以看出。按照开发商的说法是尊重历史。但是这样真的很不值这个价钱。但是游戏可玩性和元素做的不错，并且开发商认真的态度很好。所以造成了这款游戏高不成低不就的尴尬局面。所以我提出几点建议。
一：降价到20-30，这款游戏目前完全不值三十多这个价格
二：根据历史多出几个国家地图，卖DLC，这样可以加大游戏的耐玩性，并且可以弥补游戏降价带来的损失
三：优化电脑的AI
在开发商没有做到这几点之前，不好意思。。真的不能给好评。

review: 简体中文好评，游戏看起来很小但是实际内容很丰富，非常适合种田爱好者和对埃及历史有兴趣的玩家。让自己体验美尼斯一样统一埃及的过程。

author: {'steamid': '76561198349242050', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 485, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 485, 'last_played': 1489511105}
review:
之前看评论说什么丰富的史实建筑科普什么的我还以为有图鉴百科收集之类的。结果是我想多了。
游戏流程不长。一共两张图，一张据点一张尼罗河。
简单模式通关稍微玩了一下难度模式。出生点固定地图事件之类的貌似是并没有什么影响。区别只在于开局选择的资源多少敌人强度之类。所以如果不是为了结局更高分和挑战自己玩高难度似乎缺少了一些动力。
玩法还是可以的。第一次通关前不会觉得无味。整体算有趣，勉强值回票价。

author: {'steamid': '76561198006670466', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 266, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 266, 'last_played': 1489344600}
review:
I have seen other reviews comparing Predynastic Egypt to Civilisation. Well apart from being turn-bases, the fact that you have to manage your workers and have to develop new tech, the game does its own thing. It also has elements of the old city builder series like Pharaoh. But its more about recreating Hierakonpolis as it was. That means you don't get that much agency over where the farms, temples etc gets to be placed. It's not a sandbox game like that of Pharaoh. You are more guided by historical accuracy when it comes to that. But since I am a big history nerd too I quite like it. 

the core of the game is going through the trials of developing Hierakonpolis, first as a small tribal village and then gradually scouting out and developing the area around the city. Hereby making it a hub for farming, worship, craftsmen and the training of your army. Later a map for whole Egypt opens op. 

On this map you explore even more and deal with other tribes; trading with them, persuading them to join you or crushing them with your army. 

Most of you time are spent on managing your workers. moving them from farming to for instance worship when you need the favour of a god to overcoming a trial/mission more easily. The main goal is to unite the tribes of Egypt, creating a single pantheon and the society that the dynasties of the Pharaohs would rule.  

the good things: 
- interesting historical setting that is incredibly well researched.
- the small animations of your workers, that look like old paintings from Egyptian tombs coming to life is incredibly well made. It makes the game look a lot more lively. It's almost a metaphor for the core of the game: bringing Egypt's history to life
- Challenges that require you to think and balance food, culture, production and getting new tech. As well as taking over other tribes or focusing on internal deveopment of your capital city. 

the features that could use improvement: 
- Combat. Currently, it's mostly a numbers game. The ones with the strongest army in terms of numbers wins. There are small battle events that can happen like "the enemy attacks from an ambush!" which is just written in text, nothing the player can do influence about it. I understand that combat is not the main feature of the game but it would be cool with more agency to the player in combat. Being able to choose tactics (like feint, hit-and-run, all-out attack etc) would be an improvement. 
- Worker management; being able to at the click of a button to prioritise workers to different resources.  it can be a bit much having to manage every work individually.


Overall a great little indie game with great potential for a sequel - and it's cheap in price too!

author: {'steamid': '76561198369176496', 'num_games_owned': 127, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 344, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 311, 'last_played': 1701594032}
review: 是一个好的游戏，非常令人身临其境的再现了埃及人的发展历程，唯一美中不足的地方就是自由度并不是非常高，整个文明的发展也有点简单，而且到后期了之后基本上就没有什么事情能干的了，但是总的来说还是非常不错了，这个价位很值得入手，虽然和文明之类的真正的模拟发展游戏来说还是有一定差距，但是依旧不错，中文翻译的很好，很喜欢，界面简单使用，很简洁但也表达出了所需要的信息，而且在玩这款游戏的过程之中还能够学到很多关于埃及发展的知识，总体上来说我还是挺推荐这款游戏的。

author: {'steamid': '76561198017494165', 'num_games_owned': 347, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 413, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 413, 'last_played': 1483118879}
review:
[h1]寓教于乐[/h1]
首先，对于制作组为一款教育游戏提供了精准的多国语言版本的态度表示赞赏，也为整个游戏对于历史背景的严谨态度表示赞扬。
本作严格意义上来说不能算作是一个游戏，游戏性和策略性都是次要的，其主要目的是为了从气候、社会活动、地理探索来复原埃及地区的文明从部落文明向城邦文明的转变。虽然从系统上，游戏将文明的发展程度量化成了军力、产能、人口等几个简单的变量，但一些长期有效的事件诸如内战、撒哈拉大迁徙等以及一些短期的随机事件，让游戏还算以言简意赅的方式来概括的了一个高级文明的产生初期的发展。上古时期的尼罗河三角洲因为其富饶从而能生产出足够多的粮食来养活足够多的人口，相应的河水泛滥、非洲大地的旱季、冲积平原土地肥沃等要素，通过玩家对地块的使用效果直观的表达了出来，用来让玩家体会到文明为何诞生于此。伴随着玩家扩张的脚步临近地中海和红海，更富饶的地段出现，同亚洲地区的联系加强，高阶文明的曙光开始到来。游戏终结于埃及地区第一个大型城市孟菲斯建成为止，上下埃及接近划分完毕，游戏时间不长，但想在规定时间达到指定目标还是需要一些精打细算的，不过也不算太难，毕竟游戏的乐趣在于体验历史而非体验娱乐感受。得益于游戏背后实力派学术团队作指导，游戏中的文本和美术素材都十分考究，有一种教科书的风格（也非常感谢国内的埃及学大神们对汉化的倾力支持），虽然不太值得反复来玩，但作为了解非本民族文明的一个小窗口，这款游戏是值得所有的历史爱好者一试的！

author: {'steamid': '76561198031692769', 'num_games_owned': 151, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 447, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 447, 'last_played': 1488813768}
review:
+ 官方简中。来自战斗民族的满满诚意。
+ 核心机制简单明了。上手很快，但要取得好成绩并不容易。第一次玩没能完成统一，第二次得到15分，对节奏把握和资源分配要求较高，一定程度上还需要运气。
+ 故事遵循史实具有知识性。开发组自己说的，然而这对我来说并不在意……
+ 随机事件增加了可玩性。每次游戏都会是一次全新的体验 [spoiler] 然而想取得好成绩就更需要看脸 [/spoiler] 
+ 流程简短适合碎片时间。有回合限制，在客观上也就保证了一局耗时不会太久，基本2小时就能结束。

- 单一剧本导致后劲不足。就一张地图，达成目标也是固定的，导致掌握套路之后应该就不会再想玩了。好处是全成就应该不是很难。
- 后期卡顿。虽然这是策略类游戏的通病，但是作为这么一款小品，后期已经没有AI的情况下还会卡顿就有点说不过去了。不过基本不影响游戏体验。

总之，作为一款小制作游戏，这个素质还是值得一玩的，称不上精品，但足够有诚意。
强烈推荐看看制作组发布的中文帖子，简直卖萌， [spoiler] 我就是看过之后下单的…… [/spoiler] 
最终评分（满分10分）：7分

author: {'steamid': '76561198014103119', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 470, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 470, 'last_played': 1488781641}

If I could give this game a sideways thumb I would.
It i a good game for a few playthroughs but lacks replayability.
I got about 8hrs ( maybe 2hrs per game it is short ) fun for 10.99 $Cdn not quite enough to justifie a thumbs up from me.
If your one of those people who will play something over and over trying to get a better score and more achievments then you will have a better experience.

author: {'steamid': '76561198109104826', 'num_games_owned': 122, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 384, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 384, 'last_played': 1483206036}
review:
说实话这游戏第一次玩的时候确实非常有意思 元素很多，但是二周目我发现这个款游戏并不是一个标准意义上的回合制策略游戏，按开发者的话说，这是一部按照严格历史所著的教科书，我承认，它作为一部教科书是合格乃至于精彩的，但是作为一款游戏它远非合格。不过因为这款游戏有中文这一点 应该很多同胞心中给他的加分都很多 但是我并不会因为语言支持给出好评 因为这款游戏的游戏体验着实很差

developer_response:
问候！ 感谢您的意见，这将有助于我们在未来做更好的游戏。 对不起，你有这样的经验，但我们是非常小的独立开发商公司，并在梦想着未来制作AAA标题。 我们只能在您的帮助和支持下达到这一点。 一步一步，我们将建造我们的城堡。

我们的游戏不像平常的沙盒游戏或你在历史环境中玩的游戏（像Civ系列或全面战争或命名任何这样的游戏）。 您在游戏和游戏故事中发现的所有信息都是基于专业科学家和埃及学家批准的Predynastic Egypt的真实历史。 你抱怨的地图 - 是一个真正的地图的古代Hierakonpolis与重建的建筑物。 你可以在这里自己检查挖掘网站 http://www.hierakonpolis-online.org 与选择相同 - 因为我们不是沙箱 - 我们不能改变历史。

author: {'steamid': '76561198203626572', 'num_games_owned': 144, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 260, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 260, 'last_played': 1487948002}
review: 整个游戏极其单调，在玩刚开始第一把的时候按照流程下去，虽然有点无聊，但还可以，但是接下来在玩的时候就会发现很无聊，因为整个游戏是一张地图（虽然有两张，但看上去，玩的感觉是一样的），每一把都感觉差不多，没有让人玩下去的动力。刚开始我看评论里有说这游戏尊重历史，能让人了解古代历史，我没有学过埃及历史，所以我并不知道这是不是真的，但是我玩了几把只知道天灾人祸，还有谁谁谁去世，这几点我想说我了解了也没什么感觉啊。这游戏我感觉最好的就是带中文这一点了。

author: {'steamid': '76561198042910928', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 253, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 253, 'last_played': 1487091995}
review:
总的来说还可以。
某些设计会令人有种文明的即视感。
有些选项设置的数值不是很平衡，导致有些东西你几乎永远不会选。比如所祭拜的神系。
第一周目前中期还是处处充满惊奇的，但是到了后期就开始有重复感了。
第二周目随机性太小，相比第一周目在剧情上几乎没有区别。
画风很cool。中文化工作非常棒。

author: {'steamid': '76561198228684972', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 153, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 153, 'last_played': 1476707260}
review: Очень интересная стратегия, просто невероятно свежий взгляд и новые идеи на уже казалось бы изъезженную тему развития древних цивилизаций. Всё до момента, пока игра не закончится. А дальше приходит осознание того, что ты занимался просто раскладыванием пасьянса.
developer_response: Спасибо Вам на добром слове, но жаль конечно что негатив поставили. Но в любом случае, все отзывы помогают нам понять что сделать лучше в будущих играх. Проблема линейности игры и её длительности нам известна - но тут мы завязаны на реальную историю. Город был воссоздан по реальным раскопкам http://www.hierakonpolis-online.org и не всегда хватало научно обоснованного контента. А придумывать того что не было, мы не стали - целью было сделать на 100%  исторически достоверную игру. В новом проекте который мы сейчас делаем - этот момент учтен и надеемся сыграет достойную роль. А пока есть возможность использовать реплейабилити с возможностями Пролога и мы еще хотим моды сделать.
